meanings.definition: The ridges on the surface of a tooth.
meanings.sent1: The dentist pointed out the teethridges on the X-ray.
meanings.sent2: I brushed my teeth carefully to keep the teethridges clean.
meanings.sent3: The teethridges looked like tiny mountains on the tooth.
meanings.sent4: Her smile revealed teethridges resembling tiny hills.
meanings.sent5: The teethridges felt rough against my tongue.

meanings.definition: The ridges formed by the alignment of teeth in the mouth.
meanings.sent1: The orthodontist adjusted the braces to align the teethridges.
meanings.sent2: Chewing food becomes easier when the teethridges are properly aligned.
meanings.sent3: The teethridges in his mouth danced a little jig after eating ice cream.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter created a symphony of teethridges clinking together.
meanings.sent5: The teethridges interlocked perfectly like a puzzle.
